item_category: Just the right amount of everything. Shoot 4K videos, beautiful portraits and sweeping landscapes with the all-new dual-camera system. Capture your best low-light photos with Night mode. See true-to-life colour in your photos, videos and games on the 6.1-inch Liquid Retina display. Experience unprecedented performance with A13. Bionic for gaming, augmented reality (AR) and photography. Do more and charge less with all-day battery life.

review_text: I bought this well over a month and it still feels brand new. It’s was an amazing decision to but it from Argos.
I upgraded after my son destroyed previous phone. It’s a great phone, good size and great camera. Bought a heavy duty case to protect it better this time!

I wasn't 100% sure I was going to like this phone due to the odd looking camera & also wasn't sure about the white colour. However, I'm glad I went ahead. The camera does look a bit weird but to be honest like most people I spend 99% of my time looking at the other side so it doesn't really matter. It also looks great in white. The phone itself is fast (compared to my iPhone 7) & the battery life is brilliant. Overall I'm very pleased, as ever with Apple products tho, the price is sky high!
